item.title: 台湾敦促老年人和年轻人因呼吸道疾病避免前往中国
item.description:
Taiwan's health ministry on Thursday urged the elderly, very young and those with poor immunity to avoid travel to China due to the recent increase in respiratory illnesses there.翻译:台湾卫生部周四敦促老年人、幼儿和免疫力差的人避免前往中国旅行，因为最近中国呼吸道疾病有所增加。

The World Health Organization (WHO) last week requested China provide detailed information on the spike, which a WHO official said was not as high as before the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:世界卫生组织 (WHO) 上周要求中国提供有关激增的详细信息，世界卫生组织官员表示，这一数字没有 COVID-19 大流行之前那么高。

Taiwan has been wary of disease outbreaks in its giant neighbour since the Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) outbreak that started in China and killed nearly 800 people globally in 2002-2003.翻译:自2002年至2003年在中国爆发并导致全球近800人死亡的严重急性呼吸系统综合症（SARS）以来，台湾一直对其巨大邻国的疾病爆发保持警惕。

China, whose government claims democratically governed Taiwan as its own, initially tried to cover up that outbreak.翻译:中国政府声称对台湾实行民主治理，并称其为自己的领土，最初试图掩盖这一疫情。

In a statement released after a weekly Cabinet meeting, Taiwan's health ministry said that due to the rise in respiratory illnesses in China, "the elderly, young children and other people with poor immunity are requested not to travel to China unless necessary".翻译:台湾卫生部在每周内阁会议后发表的一份声明中表示，由于中国呼吸道疾病的增加，“请老年人、幼儿和其他免疫力较差的人除非必要，不要前往中国”。

If travel is necessary, then people should get flu and COVID vaccinations before going to China, it added.翻译:报告补充说，如果有必要旅行，那么人们应该在前往中国之前接种流感和新冠疫苗。

China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday that the rise in respiratory illnesses in China was a common issue faced by all countries and that Chinese authorities have it under effective control.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三表示，中国呼吸道疾病发病率上升是各国面临的共同问题，中国当局已有效控制疫情。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:本·布兰查德报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 对美国外交官亨利·基辛格之死的反应
item.description:
Here are reactions to the death of Henry Kissinger, a controversial Nobel Peace Prize winner who left an indelible mark on U.S. foreign policy:翻译:以下是对亨利·基辛格去世的反应：一位备受争议的诺贝尔和平奖获得者，他在美国外交政策上留下了不可磨灭的印记：

WINSTON LORD, FORMER U.S. AMBASSADOR TO CHINA AND KISSINGER'S FORMER SPECIAL ASSISTANT AT THE NATIONAL SECURITY COUNCIL:翻译:美国前驻华大使、基辛格前国家安全委员会特别助理温斯顿·洛德：

"The world has lost a tireless advocate for peace. America has lost a towering champion for the national interest. I have lost a cherished friend and mentor.翻译:“世界失去了一位孜孜不倦的和平倡导者。美国失去了一位国家利益的杰出捍卫者。我失去了一位珍贵的朋友和导师。

"Henry blended the European sense of tragedy and the American immigrant’s sense of hope.翻译:“亨利融合了欧洲人的悲剧感和美国移民的希望感。

"During more than seven decades, he transformed America’s role in the world, held the nation together during a constitutional crisis, crafted visionary volumes, counseled world leaders, and enriched the national and international discourse."翻译:“在七年多的时间里，他改变了美国在世界上的角色，在宪法危机中团结了国家，撰写了富有远见的著作，为世界领导人提供了咨询，并丰富了国家和国际话语。”

CINDY MCCAIN, U.S. DIPLOMAT AND WIFE OF LATE SEN JOHN MCCAIN:翻译:美国外交官、已故参议员约翰·麦凯恩的妻子辛迪·麦凯恩：

"Henry Kissinger was ever present in my late husband’s life. While John was a prisoner of war, and in the later years, as a senator and statesman. The McCain family will miss his wit, charm, and intelligence terribly."翻译:“亨利·基辛格一直存在于我已故丈夫的生活中。而约翰是一名战俘，在后来的几年里，他成为了一名参议员和政治家。麦凯恩家族将非常怀念他的机智、魅力和智慧。”

MARTIN INDYK, FORMER U.S. SPECIAL ENVOY FOR ISRAELI-PALESTINIAN NEGOTIATIONS AND AUTHOR OF ‘MASTER OF THE GAME: HENRY KISSINGER AND THE ART OF MIDDLE EAST DIPLOMACY’:翻译:马丁·因迪克，前美国以色列-巴勒斯坦谈判特使，《游戏大师：亨利·基辛格与中东外交的艺术》一书的作者：

"Kissinger was a man of history, but he was also a student of history, and his knowledge of history, his deep understanding, particularly of European 19th-century history, informed his whole approach to the world.翻译:“基辛格是一个研究历史的人，但他也是一名历史的学生，他对历史的了解，他的深刻理解，特别是对欧洲19世纪历史的理解，影响了他看待世界的整个方式。

"He was deeply skeptical of those who would aim to try to achieve a peaceful world. He was much more focused on establishing order because order was more reliable than peace.翻译:“他对那些试图实现和平世界的人深表怀疑。他更专注于建立秩序，因为秩序比和平更可靠。

"He was skeptical that nation-states could ever end their conflicts but if they did it would take a long time and, in the meantime, what would matter would be the order in the world ... that would ameliorate conflict, reduce the chances for war, and create conditions in which ... nation-states could learn to settle their differences, short of going to war.翻译:“他对民族国家能否结束冲突表示怀疑，但如果他们这样做，将需要很长时间，同时，重要的是世界秩序......这将缓解冲突，减少冲突的机会战争，并创造条件……民族国家可以学会解决分歧，而不是发动战争。

"His was a very conservative approach, based on the need for a balance of power on the side of those who would maintain the order and against those who would seek to disrupt it."翻译:“他采取了一种非常保守的做法，基于维持秩序的一方与试图破坏秩序的一方之间的权力平衡的需要。”

FORMER U.S. PRESIDENT GEORGE W. BUSH:翻译:美国前总统乔治·W·布什：

"America has lost one of the most dependable and distinctive voices on foreign affairs with the passing of Henry Kissinger. I have long admired the man who fled the Nazis as a young boy from a Jewish family, then fought them in the United States Army.翻译:“随着亨利·基辛格的去世，美国在外交事务上失去了最可靠、最独特的声音之一。我一直很钦佩这个来自犹太家庭的小男孩逃离纳粹，然后在美国军队与他们作战的人。

"When he later became secretary of state, his appointment as a former refugee said as much about his greatness as it did America's greatness.翻译:“当他后来成为国务卿时，他作为前难民的任命既体现了他的伟大，也体现了美国的伟大。

"He worked in the administrations of two presidents and counseled many more. I am grateful for that service and advice, but I am most grateful for his friendship.翻译:“他曾在两任总统的政府中工作，并为更多人提供咨询。我很感谢他的服务和建议，但我最感谢他的友谊。

"Laura and I will miss his wisdom, his charm, and his humor. And we will always be thankful for the contributions of Henry Kissinger."翻译:“劳拉和我会怀念他的智慧、他的魅力和他的幽默。我们将永远感谢亨利·基辛格的贡献。”

CHINA'S AMBASSADOR TO THE UNITED STATES, XIE FENG, POSTING ON X ON KISSINGER'S PASSING:翻译:中国驻美国大使谢锋在 X 上发布有关基辛格去世的消息：

"Deeply shocked and saddened to learn of Dr. Kissinger's passing at 100. My deepest condolences go to Nancy (Kissinger's wife) and her family. It is a tremendous loss for both our countries and the world. The history will remember what the centenarian had contributed to China-U.S. relations, and he will always remain alive in the hearts of the Chinese people as a most valued old friend."翻译:“得知基辛格博士享年 100 岁去世，我深感震惊和悲痛。我向南希（基辛格的妻子）和她的家人表示最深切的哀悼。这对我们国家和世界来说都是巨大的损失。历史将记住这位百岁老人的一生他为中美关系做出了重要贡献，他将作为最值得尊敬的老朋友永远活在中国人民心中。”

Reporting by Reuters bureaux; Compiled by Edwina Gibbs and Tom Hogue; Editing by Clarence Fernandez and Sonali Paul翻译:路透社分社的报道；由埃德温娜·吉布斯和汤姆·霍格编译；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯和索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 中国电动汽车品牌Zeekr暂停美国IPO——消息人士
item.description:
Zeekr, Chinese automaker Geely's premium electric vehicle (EV) brand, has put its U.S. initial public offering (IPO) on hold due to a mismatch in valuation expectations, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.翻译:据两位直接了解情况的消息人士透露，中国汽车制造商吉利旗下的高端电动汽车 (EV) 品牌 Zeekr 由于估值预期不匹配，已暂停其在美国的首次公开募股 (IPO)。

The decision was made as global financial markets remain volatile, a third source added.翻译:第三位消息人士补充说，这一决定是在全球金融市场仍然波动的情况下做出的。

The sources could not be named because they were discussing confidential information.翻译:消息人士无法透露姓名，因为他们正在讨论机密信息。

"The company has made a public filing to the SEC and is proceeding with the preparatory work," a Zeekr statement said.翻译:Zeekr 声明称：“该公司已向 SEC 公开提交文件，并正在进行准备工作。”

It declined to answer Reuters questions about the deal being put on hold due to the company's valuation target not being met and uncertain market conditions.翻译:该公司拒绝回答路透社有关由于该公司估值目标未达到且市场状况不确定而导致该交易被搁置的问题。

Reporting by Julie Zhu in Hong Kong and Scott Murdoch in Sydney; Editing by Jamie Freed and Christopher Cushing翻译:朱莉·朱 (Julie Zhu) 在香港的报道和斯科特·默多克 (Scott Murdoch) 在悉尼的报道；杰米·弗里德和克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: 国际货币基金组织表示斯里兰卡债务协议可能有助于董事会通过首次救助审查
item.description:
Sri Lanka's in-principle pact with creditor nations to restructure its debt prepares the way for the International Monetary Fund (IMF) to consider clearing the first review of a bailout next month, the global lender said on Thursday.翻译:国际货币基金组织(IMF)周四表示，斯里兰卡与债权国重组债务的原则协议为国际货币基金组织(IMF)考虑批准下个月的首次救助审查铺平了道路。

The deal comes about a month after Sri Lanka's agreement with the Export-Import Bank of China covering about $4.2 billion of outstanding debt, while clearing the IMF review could trigger a second tranche of about $334 million in funds.翻译:大约一个月前，斯里兰卡与中国进出口银行达成协议，涵盖约42 亿美元的未偿债务，同时通过国际货币基金组织的审查可能会引发第二笔约 3.34 亿美元的资金。

"These understandings pave the way for the IMF Executive Board to consider completion of the first review of Sri Lanka's four-year Extended Fund Facility Arrangement," Peter Breuer, IMF's mission chief for Sri Lanka, said in a statement.翻译:国际货币基金组织斯里兰卡代表团团长彼得·布劳尔在一份声明中表示：“这些谅解为国际货币基金组织执行董事会考虑完成对斯里兰卡四年期延期基金安排的首次审查铺平了道路。”

"We look forward to the Executive Board taking up this review by mid-December and the continuation of our productive collaboration with Sri Lanka in the period ahead."翻译:“我们期待执行委员会在 12 月中旬之前进行此项审查，并在未来一段时间内继续与斯里兰卡开展富有成效的合作。”

Sri Lanka plunged into its worst financial crisis in seven decades last year after its foreign exchange reserves dwindled to record lows.翻译:去年，斯里兰卡的外汇储备锐减至历史新低，陷入七十年来最严重的金融危机。

But since locking down the IMF bailout of $2.9 billion in March, the South Asian island nation has managed to partly stabilise its economy, bring down runaway inflation and rebuild currency reserves.翻译:但自 3 月份锁定国际货币基金组织 29 亿美元的救助以来，这个南亚岛国已成功部分稳定了经济、降低了失控的通胀并重建了货币储备。

After receiving the IMF money, Sri Lanka could get further funding from the Asian Development Bank and the World Bank, bringing the total amount to around $900 million, central bank Governor P. Nandalal Weerasinghe said last week.翻译:斯里兰卡央行行长 P. Nandalal Weerasinghe 上周表示，在收到国际货币基金组织的资金后，斯里兰卡可以从亚洲开发银行和世界银行获得进一步的资金，使总额达到约 9 亿美元。

Reporting by Uditha Jayasinghe; Writing by Sudipto Ganguly; Editing by Clarence Fernandez and Steohen Coates翻译:乌迪萨·贾亚辛格 (Uditha Jayasinghe) 报道；苏迪普托·甘古利 (Sudipto Ganguly) 撰写；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯和斯特奥恩·科茨编辑

item.title: 不丹在全国选举初轮中投票
item.description:
Bhutan began voting on Thursday in the preliminary round of national elections to choose two political parties that will contest the fourth free vote since democracy was established in the Himalayan kingdom 15 years ago.翻译:不丹周四开始在全国选举初轮中投票，选出两个政党，参加这个喜马拉雅王国15年前建立民主以来的第四次自由投票。

Nestled between China and India, Bhutan is known for its Gross National Happiness (GNH) index, an economic gauge that takes into account factors normally ignored by gross domestic product measures, like recreation and emotional well-being.翻译:不丹位于中国和印度之间，以其国民总幸福指数（GNH）而闻名，该指数是一种经济衡量指标，考虑了通常被国内生产总值指标忽略的因素，例如娱乐和情感健康。

Nearly half a million of the country’s fewer than 800,000 people are eligible to vote for the five political parties that are in the fray.翻译:该国不到80万人口中，有近50万人有资格投票给参与竞争的五个政党。

The two parties that win the highest number of votes will qualify for the final round of the election to the 47-member National Assembly, set to take place on Jan. 9.翻译:赢得最高票数的两个政党将有资格参加定于 1 月 9 日举行的由 47 名议员组成的国民议会最后一轮选举。

Voting started at 8 a.m. (0200 hours GMT) and will close at 4 p.m. Results are expected by Friday, the Election Commission of Bhutan (ECB) said.翻译:不丹选举委员会 (ECB) 表示，投票于上午 8 点（格林威治标准时间 0200 点）开始，下午 4 点结束，预计结果将在周五公布。

“I am rushing to the polling centre to cast my vote,” said Karma, a voter who uses one name and hails from Punakha, located 55 km (34 miles) north east of the capital Thimphu.翻译:“我正赶往投票中心投票，”来自普纳卡的选民卡玛 (Karma) 说道，普纳卡位于首都廷布东北 55 公里（34 英里）处。

Analysts say all five political parties have vowed to boost the $3 billion economy that is dependent on aid and tourism.翻译:分析人士称，所有五个政党都誓言要提振依赖援助和旅游业的 30 亿美元经济。

Their other pledges are also similar, such as promising to tap the country’s vast potential to generate hydro-electric power and to boost agricultural growth.翻译:他们的其他承诺也相似，例如承诺挖掘该国水力发电的巨大潜力并促进农业增长。

Bhutan, which is roughly the size of Switzerland, has deep economic and trade relations with its southern neighbor, India, which is its biggest donor.翻译:不丹面积与瑞士大致相当，与其南部邻国印度有着深厚的经贸关系，而印度是其最大的捐助国。

Reporting by Gopal Sharma; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:戈帕尔·夏尔马报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 中国寻求两国方案解决加沙冲突的“具体”路线图
item.description:
China called on the United Nations Security Council on Thursday to formulate a "concrete" timetable and roadmap for a two-state solution to achieve a "comprehensive, just and lasting" settlement of the Palestinian issue.翻译:中国周四呼吁联合国安理会制定两国解决方案的“具体”时间表和路线图，以实现巴勒斯坦问题的“全面、公正和持久”解决。

The proposal was laid out in a paper stating China's position on resolving the Palestinian-Israeli conflict released by the Chinese foreign ministry, and as China took over the rotating presidency of the Security Council for November.翻译:中国外交部在中国接任11月份安理会轮值主席国之际发布了一份文件，阐明了中国对解决巴以冲突的立场，提出了这一建议。

The 15-member council needs to intensify its diplomatic mediation, relaunch the two-state solution and convene a "more authoritative and effective" international peace conference as soon as possible, the paper said.翻译:该报称，由15名成员组成的安理会需要加强外交斡旋，重启两国解决方案，并尽快召开“更权威、更有效”的国际和平会议。

It urged the council to heed the general call of the international community for a "comprehensive ceasefire" to stop the fighting.翻译:它敦促安理会听取国际社会关于“全面停火”以停止战斗的普遍呼吁。

Since the start of hostilities in October, Beijing has refrained from condemning Hamas, but instead said it opposed acts that harm civilians and sought for de-escalation and a two-state solution.翻译:自十月份敌对行动开始以来，北京一直没有谴责哈马斯，而是表示反对伤害平民的行为，并寻求缓和局势和两国解决方案。

China's foreign minister Wang Yi, who chaired a high-level Security Council meeting on the Gaza conflict on Wednesday in New York, urged for a lasting truce in the embattled territory and warned against the conflict from spilling over to the entire Middle East region.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三在纽约主持了关于加沙冲突的安理会高级别会议，他敦促在这片陷入困境的地区实现持久休战，并警告不要让冲突蔓延到整个中东地区。

"Peace cannot be limited and the ceasefire cannot have an expiration date," China's official Xinhua news agency cited Wang as saying.翻译:中国官方新华社援引王的话说：“和平不能受到限制，停火不能有期限。”

"Once the window of opportunity is open, it should not be closed, and once the fire has been extinguished, it cannot be rekindled," he said while meeting the press.翻译:他在会见记者时表示：“机会之窗一旦打开就不应关闭，火势一旦扑灭就不可能重燃。”

Wang also said China will provide a new batch of emergency humanitarian supplies to Gaza.翻译:王还表示，中方将向加沙提供新一批紧急人道主义物资。

International calls for Israel and Hamas to further extend a truce in Gaza have intensified after Israel bombarded the enclave triggered by Hamas' deadly rampage on Oct.7.翻译:10月7日，以色列轰炸了因哈马斯致命暴行引发的飞地，国际社会呼吁以色列和哈马斯进一步延长加沙停火协议。

Israel says Hamas gunmen killed 1,200 people and took 240 hostages, while health authorities in Gaza say Israel's attack has so far killed more than 15,000 people in the enclave.翻译:以色列称，哈马斯枪手杀害了 1,200 人，并劫持了 240 名人质，而加沙卫生当局称，以色列的袭击迄今已导致该飞地超过 15,000 人死亡。

China's President Xi Jinping on Thursday also reiterated Beijing's support to the Palestinians' quest for statehood.翻译:中国国家主席习近平周四也重申了北京对巴勒斯坦建国诉求的支持。

"The crux of the Palestinian-Israeli conflict lies in the delay in the realisation of the legitimate national rights of the Palestinian people to establish an independent state," Xinhua cited Xi as saying in a congratulatory message to a conference commemorating the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian People, a U.N.-led observance.翻译:新华社援引习近平在纪念国际团结日大会上的贺信说：“巴以冲突的症结在于巴勒斯坦人民建立独立国家的合法民族权利迟迟不能实现。”联合国领导的纪念活动，与巴勒斯坦人民一道举行。

"The bitter lessons of the cycle of the Palestinian-Israeli conflict fully demonstrate that only by upholding the concept of common security can sustainable security be achieved," Xi said.翻译:巴以冲突循环的惨痛教训充分说明，只有秉持共同安全理念，才能实现可持续安全。

He called on the Security Council to shoulder its responsibilities and make efforts to promote an end to the fighting, protect the safety of civilians and stop the humanitarian catastrophe.翻译:他呼吁安理会承担起责任，为推动结束战斗、保护平民安全、制止人道主义灾难作出努力。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Ethan Wang; Editing by Jamie Freed and Gerry Doyle翻译:Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 的报道；杰米·弗里德和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 中国工厂陷入更严重的收缩，可能会有更多政策支持
item.description:
Summary:
  • Nov manufacturing PMI falls further to 49.4
  • Non-manufacturing index expands at slower pace
  • New export orders extend decline for ninth month
翻译:概括：
  • 11月制造业PMI进一步下滑至49.4
  • 非制造业指数扩张速度放缓
  • 新出口订单连续第九个月下滑

China's manufacturing activity contracted for a second straight month in November and at a quicker pace, suggesting more stimulus will be needed to shore up economic growth and restore confidence that the authorities can ably support industry.翻译:11月份中国制造业活动连续第二个月收缩，且收缩速度加快，表明需要采取更多刺激措施来支撑经济增长，并恢复人们对当局能够有力支持工业的信心。

Better-than-expected data for the third quarter led many banks to upgrade their growth forecasts for the world's second-largest economy, but despite a flurry of policy support measures negative sentiment among factory managers appears to have become entrenched in the face of weak demand both at home and abroad.翻译:第三季度好于预期的数据导致许多银行上调了对世界第二大经济体的增长预测，但尽管采取了一系列政策支持措施，但面对需求疲软，工厂经理的负面情绪似乎已根深蒂固无论是在国内还是国外。

The official purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to 49.4 in November from 49.5 in October, staying below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion, data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed on Thursday. It missed a forecast of 49.7, and only Goldman Sachs and Standard Chartered predicted it would come in so low out of 31 respondents.翻译:国家统计局周四公布的数据显示，11 月份官方采购经理人指数 (PMI) 从 10 月份的 49.5 降至 49.4，位于收缩与扩张的 50 点以下。它没有达到预期的 49.7，并且在 31 家受访者中只有高盛和渣打银行预测它的得分会如此之低。

The new orders sub index contracted for a second consecutive month, while the new export orders component extended its decline for a ninth month.翻译:新订单分类指数连续第二个月收缩，而新出口订单分类指数连续第九个月延续跌势。

"Today's PMI reading will further raise expectations towards policy support," said Zhou Hao, economist at Guotai Junan International. "Fiscal policy will be under the spotlight and take centre stage over the coming year and will be closely monitored by the market."翻译:国泰君安国际经济学家周浩表示：“今天的PMI数据将进一步提高对政策支持的预期。” “财政政策将成为未来一年的焦点，并成为焦点，并将受到市场的密切关注。”

China's economy has struggled this year to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery, held back by a deepening crisis in the property market, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions.翻译:受房地产市场危机深化、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势的影响，中国经济今年在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏。

Factory PMI has contracted for seven out of the past eight months - rising above the 50-point mark only in September. The last time the indicator was negative for more than three consecutive months was in the six months to October 2019, before the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:过去 8 个月中，工厂 PMI 有 7 个月出现收缩，仅在 9 月份就突破了 50 点大关。该指标上一次连续三个月以上为负值是在截至 2019 年 10 月的六个月内，即 COVID-19 大流行之前。

The patchy recovery has prompted many analysts to warn that China may decline into Japanese-style stagnation later this decade unless policymakers take steps to reorientate the economy towards household consumption and market-allocation of resources.翻译:不完整的复苏促使许多分析师警告称，除非政策制定者采取措施将经济重新定位为家庭消费和资源市场配置，否则中国可能会在本十年晚些时候陷入日本式的停滞。

China's central bank governor on Tuesday said he was "confident that China will enjoy healthy and sustainable growth in 2024 and beyond," but urged structural reforms to reduce reliance on infrastructure and property for growth.翻译:中国央行行长周二表示，他“相信中国将在2024年及以后实现健康、可持续的增长”，但敦促进行结构性改革，减少增长对基础设施和房地产的依赖。

Policy advisers say the government will need to implement further stimulus should it wish to sustain an annual economic growth target of "around 5%" next year, which would match this year's goal.翻译:政策顾问表示，如果政府希望明年维持“5%左右”的年度经济增长目标（这将与今年的目标相匹配），那么政府将需要实施进一步的刺激措施。

But the central bank is constrained when it comes to implementing further monetary stimulus over concerns a widening interest rate differential with the West may weaken the currency and spur capital outflows.翻译:但由于担心与西方利差扩大可能削弱货币并刺激资本外流，央行在实施进一步货币刺激措施时受到限制。

In October, China unveiled a plan to issue 1 trillion yuan ($138.68 billion) in sovereign bonds by the end of the year, raising the 2023 budget deficit target to 3.8% of GDP from the original 3%.翻译:10月，中国公布了年底前发行1万亿元人民币（1,386.8亿美元）主权债券的计划，将2023年预算赤字目标从原来占GDP的3%提高到3.8%。

A separate PMI reading on the non-manufacturing sector also weakened, falling to 50.2 in November from 50.6 last month, indicating activity in the vast service sector and construction continues to slow.翻译:非制造业的单独 PMI 读数也有所减弱，从上个月的 50.6 降至 11 月份的 50.2，表明庞大的服务业和建筑业的活动继续放缓。

Reporting by Joe Cash; Editing by Kim Coghill and Jacqueline Wong翻译:乔·卡什报道；编辑：Kim Coghill 和 Jacqueline Wong

item.title: 新加坡、苏黎世位居世界最昂贵城市 - EIU
item.description:
Singapore and Zurich tied for the world's most expensive city this year, followed by Geneva, New York and Hong Kong, the Economist Intelligence Unit (EIU) said on Thursday as it cautioned that the global cost-of-living crisis was not yet over.翻译:经济学人智库（EIU）周四表示，新加坡和苏黎世并列今年全球生活成本最高的城市，其次是日内瓦、纽约和香港，并警告称全球生活成本危机尚未结束。

On average, prices have risen by 7.4% year on year in local currency terms for over 200 commonly used goods and services, a drop from the record 8.1% increase last year but still "significantly higher than the trend in 2017-2021," it said in a report.翻译:平均而言，200多种常用商品和服务的价格以当地货币计算同比上涨7.4%，低于去年创纪录的8.1%涨幅，但仍“显着高于2017-2021年的趋势”。在一份报告中说。

Singapore regained the top of the rankings for the ninth time in the past eleven years due to high price levels across several categories.翻译:由于多个类别的高价格水平，新加坡在过去十一年中第九次重登排行榜榜首。

The city state has the world's highest transport prices, owing to strict government controls on car numbers. It is also amongst the most expensive for clothing, groceries and alcohol.翻译:由于政府对汽车数量的严格控制，这个城市国家的交通价格是世界上最高的。它也是服装、杂货和酒类最昂贵的地方之一。

Zurich's rise reflected the strength of the Swiss franc and high prices for groceries, household goods and recreation, it said.翻译:报告称，苏黎世的上涨反映了瑞士法郎的强势以及食品杂货、家庭用品和娱乐产品的高价格。

Geneva and New York tied for third place, while Hong Kong was fifth and Los Angeles in sixth.翻译:日内瓦和纽约并列第三，香港排名第五，洛杉矶排名第六。

Asia continues to see relatively lower price increases on average compared to other regions, it said.翻译:报告称，与其他地区相比，亚洲的平均价格涨幅仍然相对较低。

Chinese cities have fallen in its rankings with four cities - Nanjing, Wuxi, Dalian and Beijing - among the biggest movers down the rankings this year along with Osaka and Tokyo in Japan.翻译:中国城市的排名有所下降，其中南京、无锡、大连和北京这四个城市是今年排名下降幅度最大的城市，另外还有日本的大阪和东京。

Reporting by Farah Master; Editing by Christopher Cushing翻译:法拉大师报道；克里斯托弗·库欣编辑

item.title: First Quantum 首席财务官表示为巴拿马铜项目引入合作伙伴还为时过早
item.description:
First Quantum Minerals (FM.TO) said on Wednesday it is too early and challenging to bring a new partner into its flagship Panama copper project as the Canadian company declared force majeure on output from the mine.翻译:第一量子矿业(FM.TO)周三表示，由于该加拿大公司宣布该矿产量受到不可抗力影响，现在为其旗舰巴拿马铜矿项目引入新合作伙伴还为时过早且具有挑战性。

The comments were made by First Quantum Minerals CFO Ryan MacWilliam at an annual mining conference organized by Scotiabank, according to a note prepared by the Canadian bank and reviewed by Reuters.翻译:根据加拿大丰业银行准备并经路透社查阅的一份报告，第一量子矿业首席财务官 Ryan MacWilliam 在丰业银行组织的年度采矿会议上发表了上述言论。

The future of First Quantum's Cobre Panama mine, which accounts for about 1% of global copper output, became uncertain after Panama President Laurentino Cortizo on Tuesday announced the closure of the mine. This followed the country's top court declaring First Quantum's contract to own and operate the mine unconstitutional.翻译:第一量子旗下的巴拿马 Cobre 铜矿约占全球铜产量的 1%，在巴拿马总统劳伦蒂诺·科尔蒂索 (Laurentino Cortizo) 周二宣布关闭该矿后，该矿的未来变得不确定。此前，该国最高法院宣布第一量子拥有和经营该矿的合同违宪。

MacWilliam's remarks are the first from the company on the future of the mine since the court's ruling.翻译:麦克威廉的言论是自法院裁决以来该公司首次就该矿的未来发表讲话。

First Quantum suspended the jobs of 7,000 contract staff at Cobre Panama copper mine due to force majeure, according to a separate internal memo reviewed by Reuters on Wednesday, citing disruptions at its main port by protesters as the cause of a shutdown in operations.翻译:路透社周三查阅的另一份内部备忘录显示，由于不可抗力，第一量子暂停了巴拿马 Cobre 铜矿 7,000 名合同工的工作，并称抗议者对主要港口的干扰是导致运营关闭的原因。

The head of the union that represents Cobre Panama mine workers, Michael Camacho, confirmed the content of the company document.翻译:代表巴拿马 Cobre 矿工的工会主席迈克尔·卡马乔 (Michael Camacho) 证实了该公司文件的内容。

When asked for comment on CFO MacWilliam's remarks, First Quantum referred to the Scotiabank note. Scotiabank said it had no additional comment beyond what it had published.翻译:当被问及对首席财务官麦克威廉的言论发表评论时，第一量子提到了丰业银行的票据。丰业银行表示，除已发表的内容外，没有其他评论。

Panama has seen unprecedented public protests after the government signed a new contract with First Quantum for its Cobre Panama mine. The protesters choked supplies to the mine, forcing First Quantum to suspend the mine last week.翻译:巴拿马政府与第一量子公司为其巴拿马铜矿签署新合同后，引发了前所未有的公众抗议。 抗议者切断了对该矿的供应，迫使第一量子公司上周暂停了该矿的开采。

MacWilliam told the conference that given the events in Panama, it remains unclear when Cobre Panama will be able to resume operations.翻译:麦克威廉在会议上表示，鉴于巴拿马发生的事件，目前尚不清楚 Cobre巴拿马何时能够恢复运营。

The Cobre Panama mine's workers staged protests in different parts of the country earlier on Wednesday, seeking answers on the future of their job posts.翻译:周三早些时候，巴拿马科布雷矿的工人在全国各地举行抗议活动，寻求工作岗位未来的答案。

Bringing in a new investor to help fortify First Quantum's balance sheet has been suggested as a likely solution to balance its financial risks.翻译:有人建议引入新投资者来帮助强化第一量子的资产负债表，作为平衡其财务风险的可能解决方案。

The protests have wiped out about C$11 billion ($8.1 billion) from First Quantum's market value. On Wednesday, the stock was down about 10%.翻译:抗议活动已导致 First Quantum 的市值蒸发约 110 亿加元（81 亿美元）。周三，该股下跌约10%。

First Quantum supports more than 40,000 indirect and direct job posts in Panama.翻译:First Quantum 支持巴拿马超过 40,000 个间接和直接工作岗位。

Separately, the company said in a statement on Wednesday it was interested in pursuing dialogue with the Panama government, and warned of environmental damage if the mine were not shut in an orderly manner.翻译:另外，该公司周三在一份声明中表示，有兴趣与巴拿马政府进行对话，并警告称，如果不有序关闭该矿，将会对环境造成损害。

China's Jiangxi Copper Co Ltd (600362.SS) is First Quantum's biggest shareholder.翻译:中国江西铜业股份有限公司（600362.SS）是第一量子的最大股东。

The mine closure also has consequences for the Central American nation, as Cobre Panama contributes about 5% to Panama's economy.翻译:矿场关闭也对这个中美洲国家产生了影响，因为巴拿马铜矿对巴拿马经济的贡献约为 5%。

First Quantum, which has spent over $10 billion to develop the mine, has launched two separate tracks of international arbitration to protect its assets, the CFO said, which accounted for about 46% of its third quarter earnings.翻译:该首席财务官表示，第一量子已斥资超过 100 亿美元开发该矿，并启动了两个独立的国际仲裁来保护其资产，该资产约占其第三季度收益的 46%。

($1 = 1.3594 Canadian dollars)翻译:（1 美元 = 1.3594 加元）

item.title: 美元跌至三个月低位附近，关注通胀数据
item.description:
The dollar was rooted near a three-month low on Thursday and was set to post its steepest monthly decline in a year as investors ramped up bets that the Federal Reserve is done with rate hikes ahead of a crucial inflation report later in the day.翻译:美元周四触及三个月低点附近，并将录得一年来最大幅度的月度跌幅，因为投资者加大了对美联储在当天晚些时候发布重要通胀报告之前完成加息的押注。

The dollar index , which measures U.S. currency against six rivals, eased 0.058% to 102.74, not far from 102.46 - its lowest since Aug. 10 it touched on Wednesday.翻译:衡量美元兑六种货币的美元指数下跌0.058%至102.74，距离周三触及的8月10日以来最低点102.46不远。

The index is down 3.7% in November on growing expectations the Fed will cut interest rates in the first half of 2024.翻译:由于美联储将在 2024 年上半年降息的预期不断增强，该指数 11 月下跌 3.7%。

The dollar clawed back some of its losses on Wednesday after data showed the U.S. economy grew faster in the third quarter than initially reported.翻译:数据显示美国第三季度经济增长快于最初公布的数据后，美元周三收复了部分跌幅。

"I think it's still pretty much all about U.S. yields. And by extension FOMC policy," said Carol Kong, currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia.翻译:澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师卡罗尔·孔表示：“我认为这仍然很大程度上取决于美国收益率。此外还有联邦公开市场委员会的政策。”

"Markets will continue to play to focus on what FOMC officials say about the prospect of the upcoming rate-hike cycle."翻译:“市场将继续关注联邦公开市场委员会官员对即将到来的加息周期前景的看法。”

Investor focus will be on comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell, who is due to speak on Friday in the wake Fed Governor Christopher Waller on Tuesday flagging a possible rate cut in the months ahead.翻译:投资者关注的焦点将是美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的评论，鲍威尔定于周五发表讲话，此前美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒周二暗示未来几个月可能降息。

But before that, spotlight will be on Thursday's crucial personal consumption expenditure (PCE) inflation report.翻译:但在此之前，焦点将是周四重要的个人消费支出（PCE）通胀报告。

Christopher Wong, currency strategist at OCBC, said the data will offer a glimpse into whether the disinflation trend seen so far remains intact. "If core PCE undershoots expectations to the downside, then USD may extend the move lower again."翻译:华侨银行(OCBC)货币策略师克里斯托弗·黄(Christopher Wong)表示，这些数据将让人们了解迄今为止的通货紧缩趋势是否仍然完好无损。 “如果核心个人消费支出低于预期，那么美元可能会再次延续下跌趋势。”

U.S. financial conditions are the loosest since early September and have eased 100 basis points (bps) in a month, according to Goldman Sachs. The bank's global and emerging market indexes ticked up a bit last week, but financial conditions are also looser by around 100 bps from a month ago.翻译:高盛表示，美国金融状况为 9 月初以来最宽松的水平，一个月内下降了 100 个基点 (bps)。该银行的全球和新兴市场指数上周小幅上涨，但金融状况也较一个月前宽松约 100 个基点。

U.S. rates futures markets are now pricing in more than 100 basis points of rate cuts next year starting in May, and the two-year Treasury yield is its lowest since July - it has slumped nearly 40 basis points this week alone.翻译:美国利率期货市场目前预计明年5月起降息幅度将超过100个基点，两年期国债收益率为7月以来的最低水平——仅本周就下跌了近40个基点。

The weakness in the dollar has allowed most Asian and regional currencies to take advantage. Two of the best-performers are at the polar opposite ends of the 'carry' spectrum - the New Zealand dollar and Japanese yen .翻译:美元的疲软使得大多数亚洲和区域货币得以利用。表现最好的两种货币——新西兰元和日元——处于“利差”范围的两端。

The kiwi got an extra boost on Wednesday following the central bank's 'hawkish hold' - policymakers kept the key cash rate at a relatively high 5.50%, but unexpectedly signalled that it could be raised again if inflation doesn't moderate.翻译:新西兰元周三在央行“鹰派立场”之后获得额外提振——政策制定者将关键现金利率维持在相对较高的 5.50%，但出人意料地表示，如果通胀不放缓，可能会再次上调利率。

The currency was 0.26% higher at $0.6172, staying close to the four month peak of $0.6207 it touched on Wednesday.翻译:该货币上涨0.26%至0.6172美元，接近周三触及的四个月高点0.6207美元。

Meanwhile, expectations that the Bank of Japan will soon end its negative rate policy has pulled the yen up from the depths, and in the process, eased pressure on the central bank to support the currency via direct FX market intervention.翻译:与此同时，对日本央行将很快结束负利率政策的预期将日元从深渊拉升，并在此过程中缓解了央行通过直接干预外汇市场来支持日元的压力。

On Thursday, yen strengthened 0.09% to 147.11 per dollar, remaining close to two and half month high of 146.675 per dollar it touched on Wednesday.翻译:周四，日元兑美元汇率上涨0.09%，至1美元兑147.11美元，仍接近周三触及的两个半月高点1美元兑146.675美元。

Sterling was last at $1.2695, up 0.01% on the day, while the euro was up 0.06% at $1.0975. The Australian dollar rose 0.08% to $0.6623.翻译:英镑最新报1.2695美元，当天上涨0.01%，而欧元上涨0.06%，报1.0975美元。澳元兑美元上涨0.08%至0.6623美元。

Reporting by Ankur Banerjee and Vidya Ranganathan in Singapore; Editing by Kim Coghill翻译:Ankur Banerjee 和 Vidya Ranganathan 在新加坡的报道；编辑：金·科吉尔

item.title: 需求指标疲软和中国数据导致油价下跌
item.description:
Oil prices fell in early Asian trade on Thursday on weaker-than-expected Chinese manufacturing data, but investors maintained caution ahead of an OPEC+ meeting where production cuts are expected.翻译:由于中国制造业数据弱于预期，周四亚洲早盘油价下跌，但投资者在欧佩克+会议预计减产之前保持谨慎。

Brent crude futures fell 28 cents, or 0.3%, to $82.90 a barrel by 0024 GMT, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate (WTI) crude futures fell 24 cents, or 0.3%, to $77.68 a barrel.翻译:截至 GMT 0024，布伦特原油期货下跌 28 美分，即 0.3%，至每桶 82.90 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油 (WTI) 原油期货下跌 24 美分，即 0.3%，至每桶 77.68 美元。

China's manufacturing activity contracted for a second straight month in November and at a quicker pace than expected, an official factory survey showed on Thursday, suggesting more policy support measures are needed to help shore up economic growth in the world's largest oil importer.翻译:周四的官方工厂调查显示，中国11月份制造业活动连续第二个月收缩，且收缩速度快于预期，表明需要更多政策支持措施来帮助支撑全球最大石油进口国的经济增长。

The official purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to 49.4 in November from 49.5 in October, staying below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion. Analysts polled by Reuters had expected a reading of 49.7.翻译:官方采购经理人指数（PMI）从 10 月的 49.5 降至 11 月的 49.4，仍低于 50 点的收缩与扩张界限。路透社调查的分析师此前预期该值为 49.7。

The U.S. Energy Information Administration on Wednesday reported a surprise build in U.S. crude oil and distillate fuel stocks last week, indicating weak demand. Gasoline stocks also rose by more than expected, the data showed.翻译:美国能源情报署周三报告称，上周美国原油和馏分油库存意外增加，表明需求疲软。数据显示，汽油库存增幅也超过预期。

Oil markets in the previous session found support from hopes of some form of a price-supportive resolution from the OPEC+ group, which includes the Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies such as Russia.翻译:上一交易日，石油市场因希望欧佩克+集团（包括石油输出国组织及其俄罗斯等盟友）达成某种形式的价格支持决议而获得支撑。

Members of OPEC+ are due to hold a policy meeting on Thursday. Talks ahead of the meeting were focusing on additional production cuts, although details were yet to be agreed, sources close to the group told Reuters.翻译:OPEC+成员国定于周四举行政策会议。接近该集团的消息人士告诉路透社，会议前的谈判重点是进一步减产，但细节尚未达成一致。

Another media report on Wednesday said that the cut could be as much as 1 million barrels a day.翻译:周三另一家媒体报道称，减产幅度可能高达每天 100 万桶。

item.title: 台湾总统：中国“不知所措”，无法考虑入侵
item.description:
China's leadership is too "overwhelmed" with its internal problems to consider an invasion of Taiwan, President Tsai Ing-wen said in an interview with the New York Times.翻译:蔡英文总统在接受《纽约时报》采访时表示，中国领导层对其内部问题“不堪重负”，不会考虑入侵台湾。

China, which views democratically governed Taiwan as its own territory, has ramped up military pressure against the island over the past four years, leading to concerns of a conflict that would have global repercussions.翻译:中国将民主治理的台湾视为自己的领土，过去四年加大了对该岛的军事压力，引发了人们对冲突可能产生全球影响的担忧。

But Tsai, in a transcript of the interview her office published on Thursday, said China had too many issues at the moment.翻译:但蔡英文在其办公室周四发布的采访记录中表示，中国目前存在太多问题。

"Well, I think the Chinese leadership at this juncture is overwhelmed by its internal challenges. And my thought is that perhaps this is not a time for them to consider a major invasion of Taiwan," she said.翻译:“嗯，我认为中国领导层在这个时刻被其内部挑战压垮了。我的想法是，也许现在不是他们考虑大规模入侵台湾的时候，”她说。

"Largely because the internal economic and financial as well as political challenges, but also, the international community has made it loud and clear that war is not an option, and peace and stability serves everybody's interests."翻译:“很大程度上是因为国内经济、金融以及政治挑战，而且国际社会已经明确表示，战争不是一种选择，和平与稳定符合每个人的利益。”

Tsai and her government have repeatedly called for talks with China but been rebuffed, as Beijing views Tsai and the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) as separatists.翻译:蔡英文及其政府多次呼吁与中国进行谈判，但遭到拒绝，因为北京将蔡英文和执政的民进党视为分裂分子。

Tsai says only Taiwan's people can decide their future.翻译:蔡英文表示，只有台湾人民才能决定自己的未来。

Taiwan is in the middle of campaigning for presidential and parliamentary elections to be held on Jan. 13. The DPP's Lai Ching-te, currently vice president, is the frontrunner to be Taiwan's next president according to opinion polls.翻译:台湾正在为1月13日举行的总统和议会选举进行竞选活动。根据民意调查，现任副总统的民进党候选人赖清德是台湾下届总统的领先者。

Tsai said it was "no secret" that China was trying to interfere in Taiwan's elections.翻译:蔡英文表示，中国试图干预台湾选举“不是什么秘密”。

"But I think they're probably not particularly successful in their effort of trying to influence the election here. Primarily, because this is a democracy and people know that they have made their best decisions as to who is going to be the next leader of Taiwan," she added.翻译:“但我认为他们在试图影响这里的选举方面可能并不是特别成功。主要是因为这是一个民主国家，人们知道他们已经就谁将成为下一任领导人做出了最佳决定。台湾，”她补充道。

China's Taiwan Affairs Office on Wednesday stepped up its attacks on Lai and his running mate Hsiao Bi-khim, formerly Taiwan's envoy to the United States.翻译:中国台湾事务办公室周三加大了对赖智及其竞选搭档、前台湾驻美国特使萧美琴的攻击力度。

"Taiwan independence means war. The DPP pushing this dangerous independence double act will only poison the interests and well being of compatriots on the island," spokesperson Chen Binhua told a news conference.翻译:台独就意味着战争，民进党推行这种危险的台独双重行径，只会毒害岛内同胞的利益和福祉。”

Speaking to reporters in Taipei on Thursday, top China-policy maker Chiu Tai-san dismissed Beijing's criticisms.翻译:中国最高决策者邱泰山周四在台北对记者发表讲话，驳斥了北京方面的批评。

"Honestly speaking, those comments show they don't even know what democratic politics and elections are," said Chiu, who heads Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council.翻译:台湾陆委会主任邱说：“老实说，这些言论表明他们根本不知道什么是民主政治和选举。”

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by Stephen Coates and Lincoln Feast.翻译:本·布兰查德报道；斯蒂芬·科茨和林肯·费斯特编辑。

item.title: 11月份中国工厂活动延续跌势
item.description:
China's manufacturing activity contracted for a second straight month in November and at a quicker pace, an official factory survey showed on Thursday, suggesting more policy support measures are needed to help shore up economic growth.翻译:周四的官方工厂调查显示，中国11月份制造业活动连续第二个月收缩，且收缩速度加快，这表明需要更多政策支持措施来帮助支撑经济增长。

The official purchasing managers' index (PMI) fell to 49.4 in November from 49.5 in October, staying below the 50-point level demarcating contraction from expansion. Analysts polled by Reuters had expected a reading of 49.7.翻译:官方采购经理人指数（PMI）从 10 月的 49.5 降至 11 月的 49.4，仍低于 50 点的收缩与扩张界限。路透社调查的分析师此前预期该值为 49.7。

China's economy has struggled this year to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery, held back by a deepening crisis in the property market, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions.翻译:受房地产市场危机深化、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势的影响，中国经济今年在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏。

A flurry of policy support measures has had only modest effect, raising pressure on authorities to roll out more stimulus.翻译:一系列政策支持措施收效甚微，加大了当局推出更多刺激措施的压力。

item.title: 万达地产称延长6亿美元债券偿还期限已提前获得持有人同意
item.description:
Chinese real estate firm Wanda Properties International [RIC:RIC:WPIC.UL], a unit of conglomerate Dalian Wanda Group, said on Thursday it had received early consent approval from bondholders to extend the repayment on a $600 million guaranteed bond due 2024.翻译:大连万达集团旗下中国房地产公司万达地产国际[RIC:RIC:WPIC.UL]周四表示，已获得债券持有人的提前同意，延长2024年到期的6亿美元担保债券的偿还期限。

The regulatory filing in Hong Kong said those voting in favour of the extension represented more than 99.3% of the aggregate principal amount of the bonds.翻译:香港的监管文件称，投票赞成延期的人占债券本金总额的99.3%以上。

Wanda Properties is still seeking final approval to extend the payment date of its $600 million 7.25% note to Dec. 29, 2024 from the current maturity date of Jan. 29, at a meeting of bondholders on Dec. 13 this year.翻译:万达地产仍在寻求最终批准，以在今年 12 月 13 日的债券持有人会议上将其 6 亿美元、年息 7.25% 票据的付款日期从目前的 1 月 29 日到期日延长至 2024 年 12 月 29 日。

item.title: 中国习近平访问金融中心上海
item.description:
China President Xi Jinping visited Shanghai, where he went to several venues and learned about the city's efforts to strengthen its competitiveness as an international financial centre, Xinhua news agency reported on Wednesday.翻译:据新华社周三报道，中国国家主席习近平访问上海，参观了上海多个场馆，了解上海为增强国际金融中心竞争力所做的努力。

Xi made the trip on Tuesday and Wednesday and he inspected the Shanghai Futures Exchange, an exhibition on Shanghai's sci-tech innovations and a government-subsidized rental housing community, the report said.翻译:报道称，习近平周二和周三出访，考察了上海期货交易所、上海科技创新展览和政府补贴租赁住房社区。

He was seen with other government leaders, including Cai Qi, the head of the powerful Secretariat of the Communist Party of China Central Committee that oversees day-to-day affairs of the CPC.翻译:人们看到他与其他政府领导人在一起，其中包括负责中共日常事务的中共中央书记处书记蔡奇。

Vice Premier He Lifeng, Shanghai's Communist party secretary Chen Jining and Mayor Gong Zheng also accompanied his visit.翻译:国务院副总理何立峰、上海市委书记陈吉宁、市长龚正陪同考察。

A video posted by state television showed Xi inspecting a humanoid robot and a section of an exhibition showcasing China's integrated circuits technology, an industry that he has been pushing for more modernisation and self-sufficiency.翻译:国家电视台发布的一段视频显示，习近平正在检查一个人形机器人，以及展示中国集成电路技术的展览的一部分，他一直在推动这个行业更加现代化和自给自足。

He could also be seen touring an affordable housing compound in Shanghai's Minhang district. The Chinese government has in recent months pledged more support in boosting affordable housing as high home prices in major cities like Shanghai shut out many buyers.翻译:人们还看到他参观了上海闵行区的一个经济适用房小区。由于上海等主要城市的高房价将许多购房者拒之门外，中国政府近几个月承诺加大经济适用房支持力度。

It was his first visit to the city since November 2020 and comes a year after historic street protests against China's zero-COVID policy broke out in Shanghai.翻译:这是他自 2020 年 11 月以来首次访问这座城市，一年前，上海爆发了针对中国零新冠政策的历史性街头抗议活动。

The visit also coincides with the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the Shanghai Free-Trade Zone (FTZ), a testing ground for economic reforms that has struggled to live up to its initial promise of free-flowing currency and easier international trade.翻译:此次访问也恰逢上海自由贸易区（FTZ）成立十周年。上海自由贸易区是经济改革的试验场，一直在努力兑现其最初承诺的货币自由流动和国际贸易便利化的承诺。

Shanghai is home to China's largest foreign business community, hosting firms such as Tesla (TSLA.O), Disney (DIS.N) and L'Oreal, but its economy and global reputation was badly hit by a two-month-long COVID-induced lockdown last year.翻译:上海是中国最大的外国商业社区的所在地，拥有特斯拉(TSLA.O) 、迪士尼(DIS.N)和欧莱雅等公司，但其经济和全球声誉受到了长达两个月的新冠疫情的严重打击。去年引发的封锁。

Xi's visit also comes as confidence among foreign businesses and private investors in the Chinese economy remains subdued, hurt by the country's past COVID policies and a years-long regulatory crackdown on sectors from technology to property that the government began easing this year.翻译:习近平此次访问之际，外国企业和私人投资者对中国经济的信心仍然低迷，原因是中国过去的新冠疫情政策以及政府今年开始放松的对技术和房地产等行业长达数年的监管打压。

Overtures by Chinese Premier Li Qiang, a close Xi confidant, to both foreign firms and local entrepreneurs over the past year where he has declared the country open for business has been greeted with scepticism in light of a broader anti-espionage law, and moves such as raids on consultancies, as well as a lack of policies to boost confidence.翻译:过去一年里，习近平的亲密密友、中国总理李强向外国公司和当地企业家提出的建议，他宣布中国开放商业，但鉴于更广泛的反间谍法，他受到了质疑，并采取了诸如此类的举措。对咨询机构的突击搜查，以及缺乏提振信心的政策。

item.title: 早盘竞价：大量数据、政策日能否撼动市场？
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

If this week has so far been strangely listless for Asian markets, that could be about to change suddenly on Thursday as investors brace for a deluge of top-tier economic data and policy events from across the continent.翻译:如果说本周亚洲市场迄今为止表现得异常无精打采，那么周四情况可能会突然发生变化，因为投资者正准备迎接来自整个非洲大陆的大量顶级经济数据和政策事件。

Among the highlights, South Korea's central bank sets interest rates, China releases its official manufacturing and service sector purchasing managers index reports for November, and India announces its third quarter growth figures.翻译:亮点包括韩国央行设定利率、 中国发布11 月份官方制造业和服务业采购经理人指数报告以及印度公布第三季度增长数据。

The latest industrial production and retail sales data from both Japan and South Korea are on tap too, all of which could move their respective markets, especially currencies.翻译:日本和韩国最新的工业生产和零售销售数据也正在发布，所有这些数据都可能影响各自的市场，尤其是货币。

All else equal, the risks for Asian markets on Thursday may be tilted to the upside, even though stock markets around the world again struggled on Wednesday.翻译:在其他条件相同的情况下，尽管周三全球股市再次陷入困境，但周四亚洲市场的风险可能会倾向于上行。

That's largely because the ongoing fall in the dollar and U.S. bond yields continues to loosen financial conditions. In theory, this should boost animal spirits and the allure of riskier, higher-yielding assets.翻译:这主要是因为美元和美国债券收益率的持续下跌导致金融状况持续宽松。从理论上讲，这应该会提振动物精神和风险较高、收益较高的资产的吸引力。

U.S. financial conditions are the loosest since early September and have eased 100 basis points in a month, according to Goldman Sachs. The bank's global and emerging market indexes ticked up a bit last week, but financial conditions are also looser by around 100 bps from a month ago.翻译:高盛(Goldman Sachs)表示，美国金融状况为9月初以来最宽松，一个月内下降了100个基点。该银行的全球和新兴市场指数上周小幅上涨，但金融状况也较一个月前宽松约 100 个基点。

U.S. rates futures markets are now pricing in more than 100 basis points of rate cuts next year starting in May, and the two-year Treasury yield is its lowest since July - it has slumped nearly 40 basis points this week alone.翻译:美国利率期货市场目前预计明年5月起降息幅度将超过100个基点，两年期国债收益率为7月以来的最低水平——仅本周就下跌了近40个基点。

The dollar on Wednesday hit its lowest since Aug. 10, and most Asian and regional currencies are taking advantage. Two of the best-performers are at the polar opposite ends of the 'carry' spectrum - the New Zealand dollar and Japanese yen.翻译:美元周三触及8月10日以来的最低点，大多数亚洲和地区货币都在趁机获利。表现最好的两种货币——新西兰元和日元——处于“利差”范围的两端。

The 'kiwi' dollar got an extra boost on Wednesday following the central bank's 'hawkish hold' - policymakers kept the key cash rate at a relatively high 5.50%, but unexpectedly signaled that it could be raised again if inflation doesn't moderate.翻译:在央行“鹰派立场”之后，新西兰元周三获得额外提振——政策制定者将关键现金利率维持在相对较高的 5.50%，但出人意料地表示，如果通胀不放缓，可能会再次上调利率。

Remarkably, Japanese interest rates are still negative, but maybe not for much longer. Expectations the Bank of Japan will soon end its negative rate policy has pulled the yen up from the depths, and in the process, eased pressure on the central bank to support the currency via direct FX market intervention.翻译:值得注意的是，日本的利率仍然为负，但可能不会持续太久。日本央行将很快结束负利率政策的预期将日元从深渊拉升，并在此过程中缓解了央行通过直接外汇市场干预来支持日元的压力。

South Korea's central bank is expected to keep its base rate on hold at 3.50% and leave it there until at least the middle of next year. But as the Reserve Bank of New Zealand showed on Wednesday, policymakers retain the ability to surprise.翻译:预计韩国央行将把基准利率维持在 3.50%，并至少维持到明年年中。但正如新西兰储备银行周三所表明的那样，政策制定者仍然有能力带来惊喜。

Indian GDP growth, meanwhile, is expected to have slowed to a 6.8% annual rate in the July-September period from 7.8%, while Chinese factor activity likely contracted again in November but at a slower pace.翻译:与此同时，印度 7 月至 9 月 GDP 增速预计将从 7.8% 放缓至 6.8%，而中国要素活动可能在 11 月再次收缩，但增速放缓。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Thursday:翻译:以下是周四可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- South Korea interest rate decision翻译:- 韩国利率决定

- China official PMIs (November)翻译:- 中国官方采购经理人指数（11 月）

- India GDP (Q3)翻译:- 印度 GDP（第三季度）

item.title: 外交部长：中国聚集性流感病例已得到有效控制
item.description:
A recent increase in respiratory illnesses in China is a common issue faced by that all countries and Chinese authorities have it under effective control, China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said on Wednesday.翻译:中国外交部长王毅周三表示，近期中国呼吸道疾病增多是各国面临的共同问题，中国当局已有效控制疫情。

The World Health Organization (WHO) last week requested China provide detailed information on an increase in respiratory illnesses and reported clusters of pneumonia in children.翻译:世界卫生组织（WHO）上周要求中国提供有关呼吸道疾病增加和报告的儿童聚集性肺炎的详细信息。

But a WHO official said on Monday that the spike in illnesses in China is not as high as before the COVID-19 pandemic, and reiterated that no new or unusual pathogens had been found in the recent cases.翻译:但世卫组织一名官员周一表示，中国的病例激增程度没有 COVID-19 大流行之前那么高，并重申在最近的病例中没有发现新的或不寻常的病原体。

"Recently we have seen some clusters of flu cases among children in certain parts of China. In fact, that is a very common phenomenon in many countries, and in China that has been put under effective control," Wang told reporters at the United Nations in New York where he is chairing a U.N. Security Council session on the Israel-Hamas conflict.翻译:王毅在联合国对记者说：“最近我们看到中国一些地区出现了一些儿童聚集性流感病例。事实上，这种现象在很多国家都是很普遍的现象，在中国也已经得到了有效控制。”他正在纽约主持联合国安理会有关以色列与哈马斯冲突的会议。

"China's interactions with the international community will not be affected by any factors, and we welcome more visits from friends from across the world," he said.翻译:中国与国际社会的交往不会受到任何因素的影响，我们欢迎世界各国朋友更多地来访。

Both China and the WHO have faced questions about the transparency of reporting on the earliest COVID-19 cases that emerged in the central Chinese city of Wuhan in late 2019.翻译:中国和世界卫生组织都面临着关于 2019 年底在中国中部城市武汉出现的最早的 COVID-19 病例报告透明度的质疑。

item.title: 克里表示，中美将在 COP28 峰会上合作
item.description:
The United States will work with China to make the United Nations climate negotiations that begin in the United Arab Emirates this week a success, Washington's climate envoy said on Wednesday.翻译:华盛顿气候特使周三表示，美国将与中国合作，使本周在阿拉伯联合酋长国开始的联合国气候谈判取得成功。

Cooperation between the U.S. and China, the world's two biggest emitters of greenhouse gases, is seen as crucial to securing consensus at the Nov. 30 - Dec. 12 summit, known as COP28.翻译:美国和中国这两个世界上最大的温室气体排放国之间的合作被认为对于在 11 月 30 日至 12 月 12 日举行的 COP28 峰会上达成共识至关重要。

"We have decided to actually work together to get a successful COP, to get a successful global stocktake," Kerry said of his meeting with his Chinese counterpart this month.翻译:克里在谈到本月与中国外长的会面时表示：“我们决定切实合作，以召开一次成功的缔约方会议，并成功进行全球盘点。”

The global stocktake is an assessment taking place at the climate talks on how far off countries are from limiting global heating to 1.5 degrees Celsius above pre-industrial levels.翻译:全球盘点是在气候谈判中进行的一项评估，旨在评估各国距离将全球升温限制在工业化前水平以上 1.5 摄氏度以内还有多远。

Kerry and Chinese climate envoy Xie Zhenhua met in California where the sides agreed to the revival of a bilateral climate working group that Beijing had suspended last year.翻译:克里和中国气候特使解振华在加州会面，双方同意恢复北京去年暂停的双边气候工作组。

The U.S. and China agreed to back a new global renewables target and work together on methane and plastic pollution, though differences remain on fossil fuels, among other issues.翻译:美国和中国同意支持新的全球可再生能源目标，并就甲烷和塑料污染问题开展合作，尽管在化石燃料等问题上仍存在分歧。

"We intend to work hard to see if there's further collaboration that could advance the cause for all of us," Kerry said. "Without China and the United States aggressively moving forward to reduce emissions, we don't win this battle."翻译:克里说：“我们打算努力看看是否有进一步的合作可以推动我们所有人的事业。” “如果中国和美国不积极推进减排，我们就无法赢得这场战斗。”

The talks in the UAE, a major oil producer, are a critical opportunity for governments to accelerate action on climate change. However, they remain split over the use of fossil fuels, the burning of which is the main cause of climate change.翻译:在主要石油生产国阿联酋举行的会谈是各国政府加快应对气候变化行动的重要机会。然而，他们在化石燃料的使用问题上仍然存在分歧，化石燃料的燃烧是气候变化的主要原因。

Kerry, in a call with reporters, urged major producers of fossil fuels to support language that would commit them to phasing out the use of "unabated" fossil fuels - a reference to fuels burned without emissions-capturing technology.翻译:克里在与记者的通话中敦促主要化石燃料生产商支持承诺逐步淘汰使用“有增无减”化石燃料的措辞——指的是在没有排放捕获技术的情况下燃烧的燃料。

"They need to immediately step up and be part of the solution, not the most significant part of the problem," he said without identifying any particular producer.翻译:“他们需要立即挺身而出，成为解决方案的一部分，而不是成为问题最重要的部分，”他说，但没有透露具体的生产商。

In April the Group of Seven industrialised nations, which includes the United States, agreed to speed up the "phase-out of unabated fossil fuels" in what appeared to be a possible breakthrough over their use.翻译:今年四月，包括美国在内的七国集团同意加快“逐步淘汰化石燃料”，这似乎是化石燃料使用方面的一个可能的突破。

Negotiators have turned to new terminologies in search of a compromise after divisions over the future of fossil fuels failed to lead to a deal on a phase-down at last year's summit.翻译:去年峰会上，由于对化石燃料未来的分歧未能达成逐步削减协议，谈判代表们转向新术语寻求妥协。

"We hope we can send a very strong signal that the nations of the world are committed to work together to transition away from fossil fuel emissions in the next three decades. Period. It's critical," Kerry said.翻译:“我们希望我们能够发出一个非常强烈的信号，即世界各国致力于共同努力，在未来三十年内摆脱化石燃料排放。就这样。这很关键，”克里说。

item.title: 第三季离港居民提取退休金按年增1.7%
item.description:
Residents leaving Hong Kong for good withdrew a total of HK$2.213 billion ($283.72 million) from their Mandatory Provident Fund (MPF) pension accounts in the third quarter of 2023, up 1.7% from a year earlier, government data showed.翻译:政府数据显示，2023年第三季度，永久离开香港的居民从强制性公积金(MPF)养老金账户中提取的资金总额为22.13亿港元(合2.8372亿美元)，同比增长1.7%。

A total of 8,700 claims were made in the July-September quarter, compared with the 8,600 claims taking out HK$2.177 billion during the same period in 2022, data from the Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority (MPFA) showed on Wednesday.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局（积金局）周三公布的数据显示，7月至9月季度共提出8,700宗申索，而2022年同期为8,600宗，涉及金额达21.77亿港元。

The number of claims was higher than the 7,300 for the April-June quarter and 6,700 claims in January-March that saw withdrawals of a respective HK$1.787 billion and HK$1.573 billion.翻译:索偿人数较四月至六月季度的 7,300 宗及一月至三月的 6,700 宗为高，提取金额分别为 17.87 亿港元及 15.73 亿港元。

Curbs to control the spread of COVID-19 were among the reasons for people leaving Hong Kong, which tracked China's strict zero-COVID-19 policy closely but began easing restrictions in August last year.翻译:控制 COVID-19 传播的限制措施是人们离开香港的原因之一，香港密切关注中国严格的零 COVID-19 政策，但从去年 8 月开始放松限制。

The MPF is a compulsory retirement scheme for Hong Kong residents, with employees and their employers required to make contributions.翻译:强积金是香港居民的强制性退休计划，雇员及其雇主均须缴款。

Border checkpoints were reopened fully in February while all pandemic curbs were lifted from March 1 and authorities have been trying to restore business confidence and lure investors after more than three years of severe COVID-19 measures.翻译:边境检查站于 2 月全面重新开放，而所有大流行限制措施从 3 月 1 日起取消，当局在实施了三年多的严格的 COVID-19 措施后一直在努力恢复商业信心并吸引投资者。

The city's population increased by 152,000, or 2.1%, from the middle of last year, to 7,498,100 in June this year, marking the first significant uptick since a downward trend began in 2020 due to stringent COVID-19 measures.翻译:今年 6 月，该市人口比去年年中增加了152,000 人，即 2.1%，达到 7,498,100 人，这是自 2020 年因严格的 COVID-19 措施而开始下降趋势以来的首次显着上升。

The Mandatory Provident Fund Schemes Authority said multiple claims for pension withdrawals are sometimes made by a single person as a scheme member may have more than one account.翻译:强制性公积金计划管理局表示，由于一名计划成员可能拥有多个账户，有时一人会提出多次提取退休金的申请。

In the third quarter of 2023, the total number of claims - spanning all reasons including retirement - was 68,500, an increase of 18.9% from the previous quarter's 57,600 claims.翻译:2023 年第三季度，涵盖包括退休在内的所有原因的索赔总数为 68,500 起，比上一季度的 57,600 起索赔增加了 18.9%。

($1 = 7.7999 Hong Kong dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.7999 港元)

Reporting by Donny Kwok; Editing by Bernadette Baum翻译:郭敦尼报道；伯纳黛特·鲍姆编辑

item.title: 政策措施出台后，中国新房价格今年将攀升
item.description:
Summary:
  • New home prices will likely rise in 2024
  • Property sales, investment seen continuing to slide next year
翻译:概括：
  • 2024年新房价格可能上涨
  • 明年房地产销售和投资预计将继续下滑

Prices of new homes in China are now expected to climb 3% this year after a slew of policy measures to support the country's beleaguered property market, up from earlier expectations for prices to be flat, a Reuters poll showed.翻译:路透调查显示，在采取一系列政策措施支持中国陷入困境的房地产市场后，中国新房价格预计今年将上涨 3%，高于此前价格持平的预期。

But the poll of 11 economists, conducted Nov. 20-28, also showed expectations for 1% growth in new home prices in 2024 were little changed from an August poll. Economists said more measures from authorities are needed.翻译:但 11 月 20 日至 28 日对 11 名经济学家进行的民意调查也显示，对 2024 年新房价格增长 1% 的预期与 8 月的民意调查相比几乎没有变化。经济学家表示，当局需要采取更多措施。

Defaults on debt payments by many developers in China's cash-squeezed and highly indebted property sector have sparked fears of a broader financial crisis, weighed on consumer confidence and hindered economic growth.翻译:中国现金紧张且负债累累的房地产行业许多开发商拖欠债务，引发了人们对更广泛的金融危机的担忧，打压了消费者信心并阻碍了经济增长。

Authorities, particularly those in major cities, have embarked on a string of steps to bolster demand, including allowing smaller down payments, easing curbs on home buying such as the number of homes that can be bought, lowering borrowing costs and encouraging the extension of loans.翻译:当局，特别是大城市的当局，已采取一系列措施来提振需求，包括允许减少首付、放宽对购房的限制（例如可购买的房屋数量）、降低借贷成本以及鼓励延长贷款期限。

But most analysts believe these actions must be complemented by stronger fiscal and monetary action.翻译:但大多数分析师认为，这些行动必须辅之以更强有力的财政和货币行动。

"There is still room for easing property policies in major cities in 2024 ... The market in first and second tier cities will continue to outperform third and fourth cities next year, " said Huang Yu, an analyst at real estate research firm China Index Academy.翻译:房地产研究公司中国指数分析师黄宇表示，“2024年主要城市房地产政策仍有宽松空间……明年一二线城市市场将继续跑赢三四线城市”学院。

Estimates for home unit sales for 2023 were revised down to an 8% slide compared with predictions of a 5% drop in August, the poll also showed. Economists also expect declines next year, predicting a 5% fall.翻译:民意调查还显示，与 8 月份预测的下降 5% 相比，2023 年房屋销售预期下调至 8%。经济学家还预计明年将出现下降，预计下降 5%。

"The key reason is that homebuyer confidence has not yet been fully rebuilt," said Wang Xingping, a senior analyst at Fitch Bohua.翻译:惠誉博华高级分析师王兴平表示：“关键原因是购房者信心尚未完全重建。”

According to the poll, property investment is expected to slump 10% in 2023 and then 8.4% in 2024.翻译:调查显示，预计 2023 年房地产投资将下降 10%，2024 年将下降 8.4%。

Regulators are drafting a list of 50 property developers eligible for a range of financing support, including Country Garden (2007.HK) and state-backed China Vanke (000002.SZ), Bloomberg reported last week.翻译:据彭博社上周报道，监管机构正在起草一份有资格获得一系列融资支持的 50 家房地产开发商名单，其中包括碧桂园(2007.HK)和国家支持的万科(000002.SZ) 。
